resource-type.name: Tile Set

resource-type.name: Tile Source
resource-type.template-data: image: '' tile_width: 16 tile_height: 16 tile_margin: 0 tile_spacing: 0 collision: '' material_tag: 'tile' collision_groups: 'default' animations: {id: 'anim' start_tile: 1 end_tile: 1}

command.description: Makes all of the tile set visible within the current view port
command.name: Frame Tile Set

command.description: Makes all of the tile set visible within the current view port
command.name: Frame Tile Grid

command.description: Select the eraser tool for tile maps
command.name: Select Eraser

command.description: Show/hide the grid in the view
command.name: Show Grid

tip.tip: Select a layer in the outline to paint tiles. Use the space bar to show the palette or make a brush from existing tiles with right-click (three button) or shift-click (one button).
tip.title: Painting Tiles

tip.tip: Drag a tiled image into the Project Explorer to add it to the project. Specify it in the Properties View in the bottom right.
tip.title: Tiles
